events.message: We have received John Smith's application for the Software Engineer position. His resume shows strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
John Smith's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords like software engineer, developer, and backend.
Recruiter Emma Johnson has been assigned to manage John Smith's recruitment process for the Software Engineer role.
The initial screening call with John Smith went well. He demonstrated strong knowledge of cloud infrastructure and software development principles.
John Smith replied promptly to the screening follow-up email expressing enthusiasm about the next steps in the hiring process.
A technical interview has been scheduled with John Smith for April 5th at 10 AM, focusing on software architecture and coding challenges.
